content.event: COURSE: Production Ready Serverless taught by Yan Cui, â‚¬880
content.description: Start with an intro to Lambda, moving onto API security, testing strategies, CI/CD, secret management, and operational best practices for monitoring & troubleshooting.

content.event: UK GCS Connect: Serverless Webinar
content.description: Serverless infrastructure is changing the way how applications are architected and coded. However this comes with many hidden pitfall. In this talk you will learn more about those challenges and about Webiny, an open-source framework for building full-stack serverless applications.

content.event: Webinar: Debugging Slow Lambda Response Times
content.description: In this webinar, we will show you how to quickly identify and debug latency problems due to 3rd-party services, and some best practices for dealing with poor performing 3rd party services.

content.event: Makeover your old web sites with Azure Static Web Apps with Linda Nichols
content.description: Makeover your old web sites with Azure Static Web Apps With Linda Nichols: Do you have some older web sites just sitting in your Github account and deployed to various PaaS providers? Have you delayed modernizing these applications because it's just too much hassle?

content.event: Azure Functions, GitHub Actions and Serverless CI/CD
content.description: In this presentation, we'll take a look at Azure Functions and serverless technologies. We'll see how you can easily build a scalable solution in variety of languages and set up a build pipeline using GitHub Actions.We'll also examine best practices for building distributed applications using Azure Functions and associated technologies.

content.event: Lunch n Learn - What is Serverless?
content.description: Welcome to this online lunch and learn where we dive into what Serverless is and how you can use it to build scalable and cost effective infrastructure.

content.event: OpenWhisk with Nimbella and Serverless Swift
content.description: So youâ€™ve been hearing a lot of buzz about Serverless tech, but what exactly is the serverless or cloud functions? Come to our meetup and find out about solutions from IBM and Nimbella realized with Apache OpenWhisk.

content.event: Serverless Cloud Integrations
content.description: In this webinar hosted by Big Compass, you will find out if the benefits and use cases of serverless integrations are right for your use cases. We will also explore a typical integration system set up using serverless AWS services such as Lambda, S3, and API Gateway, and dissect how each part of the system is set up under integration best practices and â€œgotchaâ€ mitigation techniques.

content.event: Fundamentals of Azure Serverless Computing
content.description: The Cloud Compute brings you free Webinar on Fundamentals of Azure Serverless Computing.

content.event: Build HTTP-based API endpoints using Azure Functions
content.description: Topics that will be covered during this session: A robust developer experience, A wide range of triggering options, An innovative way of accessing and processing data, â€œServerlessâ€ execution model, Open source runtime that runs anywhere, Other benefits, Demo

content.event: Refactoring a distributed monolith to AWS micro services
content.description:
Presented by Rehan van der Merwe -- AWS junkie, AWS SA, and AWS HERO.
This presentation shows the thought process and steps involved in refactoring a distributed monolith to microservices. We are going to remove API Gateway, use Amazon Event Bridge, and implement BASE consistency in the system to truly decouple the microservices.

content.event: Nimbella and Postman: From APIs to Serverless Cloud Applications in Minutes
content.description: APIs are at the heart of all modern-day applications. With Postman, developers can design and test their APIs, and generate mock servers to facilitate the development of cloud and mobile applications. Today, we're taking the Postman developer journey to the next level, with Nimbella.

content.event: CDK Day
content.description: More than a year has passed since AWS CDK went GA and it has grown into a family of products (AWS CDK, CDKTF, CDK8s). Letâ€™s take one day and talk Serverless and multi cloud all in CDK

content.event: ServerlessDays Hamburg
content.description: ServerlessDays Hamburg is a 2-day conference about Serverless technologies with one day of workshops and one day with talks.

content.event: ServerlessDays Amsterdam ONLINE meetup - October 2020
content.description: Join us for our online edition of the ServerlessDays Amsterdam meetup, planned for October. We'll do a live stream with 2 public talks + QA session, featuring 2 amazing guest speakers: Natalia Pipas (Data Engineer at VONQ) & Zamira Jaupaj (Solution Architect at Mobiquity).
